patthana16.32:1.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.32:2.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
